title: Apply updates to existing Valentine proposal draft (auto-moving NO button + denser bottom hearts after YES)

requirements.text: Make the evasive "NO" button start moving around immediately from initial page load (not only after hover/tap), while keeping its current evasive behavior on hover/tap (random relocation, slightly smaller, slightly faster, phrase progression).

quotes: have the no button move from around from the start.

acceptanceCriteria: On first render in the idle state, the NO button changes position on its own without requiring any pointer interaction.
Auto-movement does not change the label phrase or size; only hover/tap attempts do.
Auto-movement continues to respect safe bounds so the button remains fully on-screen across mobile/tablet/desktop and after orientation changes.

requirements.text: Ensure the evasive "NO" button is never keyboard-focusable/selectable (including Tab navigation) and remains effectively unclickable on all supported devices.
acceptanceCriteria: The NO button cannot be focused via Tab/Shift+Tab.
Pressing Enter/Space cannot activate the NO button.
Touch interactions still trigger evasive movement (dodges finger tap) and do not scroll the page due to the interaction.

requirements.text: Keep the new phrase exactly as provided in the evasive "NO" button phrase progression list: `One More  Chance ğŸ¥ºğŸ’ğŸ’•, Please Binnu!! ğŸ™ ğŸ™ `.

quotes: add in to the const phrases- the list of phrases being displayed the following 'One More  Chance ğŸ¥ºğŸ’ğŸ’•, Please Binnu!! ğŸ™ ğŸ™ '

acceptanceCriteria: The phrase appears exactly (including spacing and emojis) as one of the possible NO button labels during repeated attempts.
No other phrases are removed or reordered unexpectedly.

requirements.text: After clicking YES (when the proposal state is celebrating or completed), increase/fill the heart background effect so it is noticeably denser and visually concentrated toward the bottom of the viewport.

quotes: also fill/increase the 3d hearts found at bottom  in background after the yes is clicked.

acceptanceCriteria: In idle state, the background heart particle density remains at its normal level.
In celebrating/completed states, the background heart particles are clearly denser than idle and biased toward the lower portion of the screen.
The effect remains smooth (no visible jank) on mobile-sized viewports.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Add or change backend logic (the app is currently frontend-only).
Introduce external services, third-party auth providers, or real-time messaging.
